name: places/ChIJG9zke79ZwokRAGxppWE-uNQ
adrFormatAddress: 80 8th Ave, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Placed and received an order for a dress (paid $626.50). Within one days of its arrival, I filed for a return given their short 14-day return policy. Their system said it was having trouble generating a return label and gave an email to contact. I have emailed them three times and haven't heard back. I have tried several times to call their customer service number but it says "voicemail full." There is currently no way to get in contact with them to submit the return (which they advertise as guaranteed for a full refund within the two-week timeframe). And they don't have any in-person stores to make a return in person.

originalText.text: I would leave zero stars if I could.  I have not received a refund for a dress I returned over 6 weeks ago.  There has been response to my 5 emails, except their automated response that they will get back to you in 24 hrs, or my 3 voicemails.  This is not bad customer service.  This is no customer service.

originalText.text: I ordered a dress from them over 12 weeks ago. My tracking number has said “awaiting courier pickup” since week 2, and after contacting them over 10 times I have not been able to get ahold of anyone. Not sure if I will even be receiving my dress at this point…

originalText.text: Receieved a dress that I spent over $400 on. Didn't like fabric/fit and returned within a few days. Confirmed that Marchesa received the gown back using tracking information well within the 14 day return window. That was in June. It's now August. I still have not received any response from Marchesa despite multiple emails, phone calls, IG Dms and comments. I even created a case via PayPal and they ignored me there too. Extremely disappointed as their gowns are lovely, but it will NEVER order direct again.

originalText.text: Marchesa’s customer service could not be more poorly aligned with what they sell. I have been waiting for my dress for nearly 5 months with zero communication from Marchesa about what is happening and with no accurate estimation of when it will arrive. These dresses are ordered for meaningful occasions yet the customer service acts with complete disinterest and offers no help to reassure customers that they can be trusted to deliver on their promise of sending a dress in time. This company does not deserve to be a part of your special moments.
